resources.string: Tennis Trivia Quiz\n5 points for every correct answer
1. Who won the men\’s singles championship in Australian Open 2017?
2. Who won the women\’s singles championship in Australian Open 2017?
3. Who was the runner up in men\’s singles championship in Australian Open 2017?
4. Who was the runner up in women\’s singles championship in Australian Open 2017?
5. Which of these players (more than one correct) have won all four grand slams in Men\'s Singles?
6. Which of these players (more than one correct) have won all four grand slams in Women\'s Singles?
7. Which grand slam is named after a World War I pilot named Roland Garros ?
